channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Roadtrip
channel.desc: The village of Savoca has some of the best views in Sicily, which is why Martin Scorsese chose it to film The Godfather's wedding scene. Clive hangs out at the Bar Vitelli, made famous by the film, and chats to the caf? owner who played a bridesmaid.
